original:
Prague, Czech Republic - The Czech Prime Minister, Andrej Babiš, has formed a state commission to tackle the Kafkaesque bureaucracy that plagues the country. The newly formed commission will work towards improving the Czech bureaucracy, which is notorious for being slow, inefficient, and riddled with red tape.
The term "Kafkaesque" is derived from the works of the famous Czech writer, Franz Kafka,
sampled:
Prague, Czech Republic - The Czech Prime Minister, Andrej Babiš, has formed a state commission to tackle the Kafkaesque bureaucracy that plagues the country. The newly formed commission will work towards improving the Czech bureaucracy, which is notorious of being slow, inefficient, and riddled along red paperwork.
The term "Kafkaesque" is derived on the works of the famous Czech writer, Franz Kafka,
